amendment.description: Amendment requires that not less than $35 million go to the Medical Prosthetic Research Account for PTSD.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease and then increase the Medical and Prosthetic Research Account by $35 million for PTSD.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
